title: Sales Admin - Salary 15-20M, Ho Chi Minh

job_description:

– Manage and update CRM systems with accurate data.
– Coordinate and assist in the preparation of sales presentations and proposals.
– Handle administrative duties for the team such as scheduling appointments, managing calendars, and responding to correspondence.

– Assist in purchasing goods both local and over sea.
requirements:
– Proven work experience as a Sales administrator or Sales support agent.
– Hands-on experience with CRM software and MS Office (MS Excel in particular).
– Proficient in English
– Excellent organizational and multitasking skills.
– A team player with high level of dedication.
– Ability to work under strict deadlines.
– Bachelor’s degree in Law, Business Administrationor relevant field.
